Initializer# init(integerLiteral:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
init(integerLiteral value: Self)
```

Available when `Self` conforms to `_ExpressibleByBuiltinIntegerLiteral`.## [See Also](/documentation/swift/int/init(integerliteral:)#see-also)

### [Infrequently Used Functionality](/documentation/swift/int/init(integerliteral:)#Infrequently-Used-Functionality)

[`init()`](/documentation/swift/int/init())Creates a new value equal to zero.[`typealias IntegerLiteralType`](/documentation/swift/int/integerliteraltype)A type that represents an integer literal.[`func distance(to: Int) -> Int`](/documentation/swift/int/distance(to:))Returns the distance from this value to the given value, expressed as a stride.[`func advanced(by: Int) -> Int`](/documentation/swift/int/advanced(by:))Returns a value that is offset the specified distance from this value.[`typealias Stride`](/documentation/swift/int/stride)A type that represents the distance between two values.[`var hashValue: Int`](/documentation/swift/int/hashvalue)The hash value.
